General.Name: Yao Sheng Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Yao Sheng Electronic Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells transformers and inductors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers low frequency, LLC, flyback, LED, and flat wire transformers; high frequency transformers; and standard reactors. The company also provides FT, T, UU, and ET series common mode chokes; and iron, DR, and R core chokes, as well as PFC and high current chokes. Its products are used in LCD monitors and TVs, cell phones, personal computers, TVs, and information appliances. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 95, Zhongcheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236
